name: Extreme Drifters
description: The greatest drifting tournament starts! It is a dangerous race for the highly qualified racers. And that's your chance to show who is the best drifter. Compete with the mightiest rivals on the racing tracks of 2 cities, complete tasks and win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer (only 64 bit) Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 210 MB available space
